app.title: Moderation Settings
app.spam-protection-toggle-suspicious: Show when suspicious activity is detected
app.spam-protection-toggle-post-created: Show when a post gets created
app.spam-protection-toggle-comment-creat: Show when a comment gets created
app.card-subtitle: Prevent spam by showing reCAPTCHA which gets people to prove they are human and not a robot.
app.post-limiter-radio-ten: 10 a day in the first week
app.post-limiter-radio-five: 5 a day in the first week
app.post-limiter-radio-one: 1 a day in the first week
app.attachment-size-subtitle: Save storage space by limiting the file size that members can upload to your forum.
app.word-filter-subtitle: Combat spam by blocking posts and comments with certain words, or hide banned words from text.
app.word-filter-spam-desc: Add spam words here, use commas to separate them.
app.word-filter-banned-desc: Add banned words here, use commas to separate them.
app.word-filter-permissions-helper: Post approval will only apply to posts created after you turn this setting on.
app.word-filter-permissions-label: Who's posts would you like to review?
app.word-filter-permissions-new-members-: Those who joined Forum after you turned this setting on
app.word-filter-permissions-posts-kind-l: What kind of posts are reviewed?
app.disable-posting-subtitle: Temporarily stop posts being created in the forum. Nobody can post including you.
